content.rendered:
IT’S FALL AND THAT MEANS IT’S TIME TO ADD SOME COOL CARDIGANS TO YOUR LOOK

It’s Fall weather and I’m so excited to be able to layer with fashion-forward cardigans, leather pants, and gold chain bags. 

These new Burberry gold chain bags are so stunning and will look perfect with any color cardigans of your choice. Also, don’t be afraid to go for all one color or mix and match similar shades with your new Fall looks.

Click on the following product names to shop – Top and bottom bags are from Burberry. Top gold earring is Versace. Cotton candy decorative one earring is from SAFSAFU. Both looks and sunglasses are from FWRD.COM

Also, don’t forget to lash out with D’Medium Flare individual D’Lashes lashes and our popular D’Wispy Lashes as well as booking your lash extensions appointment!

Xo Xo, Dionne
